##### Contact Us​

Physical Address:  500 Conrad Hilton Blvd, Cisco, TX 76437;

Mailing Address:  P.O. Box 110 , Cisco, TX  76437       

Phone Number:  254.442.2111

Email:  [citymanager@](mailto:citymanager@cityofcisco.com)ciscotexas.gov  or  citysecretary@ciscotexas.gov

**City Offices will be closed February 16, 2026, in observance of President's Day.**

[View on Google Maps](https://goo.gl/7g0Ddz)

CITY of CISCO
=============

convenience station
===================

    **Hours:**

        Monday, Wednesday, & Friday:

                       12:30 p.m. - 4:30 p.m.

​        Saturday: 8:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.

DURING PERIODS OF INCLEMENT WEATHER THE CONVENIENCE STATION WILL NOT BE OPEN.  CONTACT CITY HALL BEFOREHAND IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO VERIFY IF THE STATION IS OPEN OR CLOSED DUE TO WEATHER CONDITIONS.

    

    **Prohibited:**

       Tires, batteries, oil, shingles, paint, insulation,

        anything with freon

​    **Entrance** - Present to the station attendant

    BOTH of the following:

* Your current water bill showing the convenience station fee (applies to city utility customers who pay both a water and garbage fee); and
* A photo ID bearing the same address as the water bill        ​

[View on Mobile](https://www.cityofcisco.com/convenience-station.html#)
